i.description: Rammus' basic attacks deal bonus magic damage, scaling with his Armor.

q.name: Powerball
q.description: Rammus accelerates in a ball towards his enemies, dealing damage and slowing targets affected by the impact.

w.name: Defensive Ball Curl
w.description: Rammus goes into a defensive formation, vastly increasing his Armor and Magic Resistance, amplifying Spiked Shells' damage, and returning damage to enemies that basic attack him, but he is also slowed during this time.

e.description: Rammus taunts an enemy champion or monster into a reckless assault against him. Additionally, he gains increased Attack Speed for a short time, but this bonus is extended by having any of his other spells active.

r.name: Tremors
r.description: Rammus creates waves of destruction pulsing through the ground, causing damage to nearby enemies and slowing them. Turrets take double damage from Tremors.

riot.name: Powerball
riot.description: Rammus accelerates in a ball towards his enemies, dealing damage and slowing targets affected by the impact.
riot.tooltip:
Rammus accelerates in a ball, gaining up to {{ f2 }}% Movement Speed over {{ e4 }} seconds. On enemy collision, he stops, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies, knocking them back, and slowing them by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} second.

Can be reactivated to end the effect early and put Powerball on cooldown.
Powerball is a channeled spell and is subject to interruption by spells that prevent casting.
Casting Powerball cancels Defensive Ball Curl and puts it on cooldown.

q1.name: Powerball
q1.blurb: Rammus accelerates in a ball towards his enemies, dealing damage and slowing targets affected by the impact.
q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Rammus''' tucks into a ball and begins to roll, {{ct|channel|channeling|attack=false|move=true|cast=[[File:Tremors.png|20px]] Tremors is usable. Activating [[File:Defensive Ball Curl.png|20px]] Defensive Ball Curl or recasting the ability after 1 second will interrupt it. [[File:Frenzying Taunt.png|20px]] Frenzying Taunt is disabled|items=interrupts,true,,false|spells=true,true,interrupts,interrupts}} for up to 6 seconds, gaining {{pp|key=%|150/6 to 235/6|color=ms}} {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} per second over the duration, up to a maximum of {{pp|key=%|150 to 235|color=ms}} {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}}.
q1.description2: '''Rammus''' stops rolling upon colliding with an enemy, {{tip|airborne|knocking back}} all nearby enemies 100 units over {{tt|{{fd|0.75}} seconds|Estimated}}, dealing them {{as|magic damage}}, and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them for 1 second.
notes: * ''Powerball'' will still hit nearby enemies (including minions) if ''Rammus'' is {{tip|ghosted}}.
* ''Powerball'' will trigger {{nie|Mana Charge}} twice (upon activation and when ending it prematurely).

riot.name: Defensive Ball Curl
riot.description: Rammus goes into a defensive formation, vastly increasing his Armor and Magic Resistance, amplifying Spiked Shells' damage, and returning damage to enemies that basic attack him, but he is also slowed during this time.
riot.tooltip:
Rammus enters a defensive formation for up to {{ e3 }} seconds, increasing Armor by {{ e1 }} plus {{ e6 }}% ({{ f1 }}) and Magic Resist by {{ e8 }} plus {{ e7 }}% ({{ f2 }}) but becoming slowed by {{ e5 }}%.

During this time, Spiked Shell deals {{ e4 }}% damage and also deals its damage to enemies that basic attack Rammus.

Can be reactivated to end the effect early and put Defensive Ball Curl on cooldown.
Casting Defensive Ball Curl cancels Powerball and puts it on cooldown.

w1.name: Defensive Ball Curl

'''Rammus''' is {{tip|slow|slowed}} by 30% for the duration.

riot.name: Frenzying Taunt

riot.tooltip:
Taunt an enemy champion or monster for {{ e1 }} seconds and gain {{ e2 }}% Attack Speed for the same duration.

While any of Rammus' other spells are active, Frenzying Taunt's Attack Speed bonus is refreshed.

e1.name: Frenzying Taunt
e1.blurb: Rammus taunts an enemy champion or monster into a reckless assault against him. Additionally, he gains increased Attack Speed for a short time, but this bonus is extended by having any of his other spells active.
e1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Rammus''' {{tip|taunt|taunts}} the target enemy, gaining {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} for the duration.
e1.description2: While {{ai|Powerball|Rammus}}, {{ai|Defensive Ball Curl|Rammus}} or {{ai|Tremors|Rammus}} is active, the {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} is refreshed.
notes: * ''Frenzying Taunt'' behaves like a {{tip|stun}} when cast right before ''Rammus'' enters {{tip|stasis}}.
